parameter.name: copySource
parameter.description: Specifies the source object for the copy operation.

parameter.name: acl
parameter.description: Canned ACL which defines the set of AWS accounts or groups are granted access and the type of access.

parameter.name: cacheControl
parameter.description: Specifies caching behavior along the request/reply chain.

parameter.name: contentDisposition
parameter.description: Specifies presentational information for the object.

parameter.name: contentEncoding
parameter.description: Specifies what content encodings have been applied to the object.

parameter.name: contentLanguage
parameter.description: The language the content is in.

parameter.name: contentType
parameter.description: A standard MIME type describing the format of the object data.

parameter.name: copySourceIfMatch
parameter.description: Copies the object if its entity tag (ETag) matches the specified tag.

parameter.name: copySourceIfModifiedSince
parameter.description: Copies the object if it has been modified since the specified time.

parameter.name: copySourceIfNoneMatch
parameter.description: Copies the object if its entity tag (ETag) is different than the specified ETag.

parameter.name: copySourceIfUnmodifiedSince
parameter.description: Copies the object if it hasn't been modified since the specified time.

parameter.name: expires
parameter.description: The date and time at which the object is no longer cacheable.

parameter.name: grantFullControl
parameter.description: Gives the grantee READ, READ_ACP, and WRITE_ACP permissions on the object.

parameter.name: grantRead
parameter.description: Allows grantee to read the object data and its metadata.

parameter.name: grantReadACP
parameter.description: Allows grantee to read the object ACL.

parameter.name: grantWriteACP
parameter.description: Allows grantee to write the ACL for the applicable object.

parameter.name: metadataDirective
parameter.description: Specifies whether the metadata is copied from the source object or replaced with metadata provided in the request.

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: New metadata to replace. Comma separated key value pair. The key and value are separated by ':'

parameter.name: taggingDirective
parameter.description: Specifies whether the object tag-set are copied from the source object or replaced with tag-set provided in the request.

parameter.name: serverSideEncryption
parameter.description: The server-side encryption algorithm used when storing this object in Amazon S3.

parameter.name: storageClass
parameter.description: The storage class.

parameter.name: websiteRedirectLocation
parameter.description: The redirect URL of the object if the bucket is configured as a website.

parameter.name: sseCustomerAlgorithm
parameter.description: Specifies the algorithm to use to when encrypting the object.

parameter.name: sseCustomerKey
parameter.description: Specifies the customer-provided encryption key for Amazon S3 to use in encrypting data.

parameter.name: sseCustomerKeyMD5
parameter.description: Specifies the 128-bit MD5 digest of the encryption key according to RFC 1321.

parameter.name: ssekmsKeyId
parameter.description: Specifies the ID of the symmetric customer managed AWS KMS CMK to use for object encryption.

parameter.name: ssekmsEncryptionContext
parameter.description: Specifies the AWS KMS Encryption Context to use for object encryption.

parameter.name: copySourceSSECustomerAlgorithm
parameter.description: Specifies the algorithm to use when decrypting the source object.

parameter.name: copySourceSSECustomerKey
parameter.description: Specifies the customer-provided encryption key for Amazon S3 to use to decrypt the source object.

parameter.name: copySourceSSECustomerKeyMD5
parameter.description: Specifies the 128-bit MD5 digest of the encryption key according to RFC 1321.

parameter.name: requestPayer
parameter.description: Confirms that the requester knows that they will be charged for the request.

parameter.name: tagging
parameter.description: The tag-set for the object.

parameter.name: objectLockMode
parameter.description: Specifies the Object Lock mode that you want to apply to the uploaded object.

parameter.name: objectLockRetainUntilDate
parameter.description: Specifies the date and time when you want the Object Lock to expire.

parameter.name: objectLockLegalHoldStatus
parameter.description: Specifies whether you want to apply a Legal Hold to the uploaded object.

parameter.name: destinationBucket
parameter.description: Name of the destination bucket to copy the object.

parameter.name: destinationKey
parameter.description: The name for the object to create after copying.
